original: 00001 pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā
analyzed: pāratantryam hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantra tā

original: 00001 tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
analyzed: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandhaḥ na asti tattvataḥ

original: 00002 rūpa-śleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sa ca kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: rūpa śleṣaḥ hi sambandhaḥ dvi tve sa ca katham bhavet

original: 00002 tasmāt prakṛti-bhinnānāṃ sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
analyzed: tasmāt prakṛti bhinnānām sambandhaḥ na asti tattvataḥ

original: 00003 para-apekṣā hi sambandhaḥ so asan katham apekṣate
analyzed: para apekṣā hi sambandhaḥ saḥ asan katham apekṣate

original: 00003 saṃś ca sarva-nirāśaṃso bhāvaḥ katham apekṣate
analyzed: san ca sarva nirāśaṃsaḥ bhāvaḥ katham apekṣate
dvayoḥ eka abhisambandhāt sambandhaḥ yadi tad dvayoḥ

original: 00004 kaḥ sambandho anavasthā ca na sambandha-matis tathā
analyzed: kaḥ sambandhaḥ anavasthā ca na sambandha matiḥ tathā

original: 00005 tau ca bhāvau tad-anyaś ca sarve te sva-ātmani sthitāḥ
analyzed: tau ca bhāvau tad anyaḥ ca sarve te sva ātmani sthitāḥ

original: 00005 ity amiśrāḥ svayaṃ bhāvās tān miśrayati kalpanā
analyzed: iti amiśrāḥ svayam bhāvāḥ tān miśrayati kalpanā
tām eva ca anurundhānaiḥ kriyā kāraka vācinaḥ
bhāva bheda pratīti artham saṃyojyante abhidhāyakāḥ
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ api tayoḥ asahabhāvataḥ

original: 00007 prasiddhyati kathaṃ dviṣṭho adviṣṭhe sambandhatā katham
analyzed: prasiddhi ati katham a dviṣṭhaḥ a dviṣṭhe sambandha tā katham
krameṇa bhāvaḥ ekatra vartamāṇaḥ anya nispṛhaḥ

original: 00008 tadbhāve api tad-bhāvāt sambandho na eka-vṛttimān
analyzed: tad bhāve api tad bhāvāt sambandhaḥ na eka vṛttimān

original: 00009 yady apekṣya tayor ekam anyatra asau pravartate
analyzed: yadi apekṣya tayoḥ ekam anyatra asau pravartate

original: 00009 upakārī hy apekṣyaḥ syāt kathaṃ ca upakaroty asan
analyzed: upakārī hi apekṣyaḥ syāt katham ca upakaroti asan
prāptāḥ dvi tva ādi sambandhāt savyetara viśāṇayoḥ

original: 00011 dviṣṭho hi kaścit sambandho na ato anyat tasya lakṣaṇam
analyzed: dviṣṭhaḥ hi kaścid sambandhaḥ na atas anyat tasya lakṣaṇam

original: 00012 yoga-upādhī na tāv eva kāryakāraṇatā atra kim
analyzed: yoga aupādhī na tau eva kārya kāraṇatā atra kim

original: 00012 bhedāc cen nanv ayaṃ śabdo niyoktāraṃ samāśritaḥ
analyzed: bhedāt ced nanu ayam śabdaḥ niyoktāram samāśritaḥ
paśyan ekam adṛṣṭasya darśane tad adarśane

original: 00013 apaśyat kāryam anveti vinā vyākhyātṛbhir janaḥ
analyzed: apaśyat kāryam anveti vinā vyākhyātṛbhiḥ janaḥ
darśanāt adarśane muktvā kārya buddheḥ asambhavāt
kārya ādi śrutiḥ api atra lāghava artham niveśitā
tad bhāva abhāvāt tad kārya gatiḥ yā api anuvarṇyate
saṃketa viṣaya ākhyā sā sāsnā ādeḥ go gatiḥ yathā

original: 00016 bhāve bhāvini tad-bhāvo bhāva eva ca bhāvitā
analyzed: bhāve bhāvini tad bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ eva ca bhāvi tā
prasiddhe hetu phala te pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ

original: 00017 vikalpā darśayanty arthān mithyā-arthā ghaṭitān iva
analyzed: vikalpāḥ darśayanti arthān mithyāarthāḥ ghaṭitān iva

original: 00018 bhinne kā ghaṭanā abhinne kāryakāraṇatā api kā
analyzed: bhinne kā ghaṭanā abhinne kārya kāraṇa tā api kā

original: 00018 bhāve hy anyasya viśliṣṭau śilaṣṭau syātāṃ kathaṃ ca tau
analyzed: bhāve hi anyasya viśliṣṭau śilaṣṭau syātām katham ca tau
saṃyogi samavāyi a ādi sarvam etena cintitam

original: 00019 anyonya-anupakārāc ca na sambandhī ca tādṛśaḥ
analyzed: anyonya anupakārāt ca na sambandhī ca tādṛśaḥ

original: 00020 janane api hi kāryasya kenacit samavāyinā
analyzed: janane api hi kāryasya kenacid samavāyinā

original: 00020 samavāyī tadā na asau na tato atiprasaṅgataḥ
analyzed: samavāyī tadā na asau na tatas atiprasaṅgataḥ

original: 00021 tayor anupakāre api samavāye paratra vā
analyzed: tayoḥ anupakāre api samavāye paratra vā

original: 00021 sambandho yadi viśvaṃ syāt samavāyi parasparam
analyzed: sambandhaḥ yadi viśvam syāt samavāyi parasparam

original: 00022 saṃyoga-janane api iṣṭau tataḥ saṃyoginau na tau
analyzed: saṃyoga janane api iṣṭau tatas saṃyoginau na tau
karma ādi yogi tā āpatteḥ sthiteḥ ca prativarṇitā

original: 00023 saṃyoga-ādy-āśraye yogyam ayogyaṃ tac ca jāyate
analyzed: saṃyoga ādi āśraye yogyam ayogyam tat ca jāyate
nityam yogya svabhāvasya tad vaikalya virodhataḥ
iti tad yogyatā vācyaḥ svabhāvaḥ asya nirucyatām
vibhāga yoga gatibhiḥ kim anyaiḥ gamana ādibhiḥ

original: 00025 teṣu satsv api tasya iti sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
analyzed: teṣu satsu api tasya iti sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
yuktaḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ ayam tat prati kṣaṇa janmanām
